summary: A comprehensive test suite that verifies the Whisper speech‑to‑text model’s behavior, including forward passes, generation modes, attention and hidden state outputs, long‑form generation, masking, training dynamics, gradient checkpointing, embedding resizing, serialization, and cross‑framework equivalence (PyTorch, Flax, TensorFlow).
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, performance, and interoperability of the Whisper model for production speech recognition pipelines, reducing regression risk and supporting multi‑framework deployment.
